dcterms:creator: H. Wang
J. He
X. Zhang
S. Liu
dcterms:description: A complete dataset that includes both long and short texts, designed to simulate universal situations and create a universal model for text classification.
dcterms:title: Complete Dataset (long & short)

dcterms:creator: H. Wang
J. He
X. Zhang
S. Liu
dcterms:description: A dataset containing only short texts with a maximum length of 500 characters, primarily sourced from informal channels like Weibo and Bullet screen.
dcterms:title: Short Text Dataset

dcterms:creator: H. Wang
J. He
X. Zhang
S. Liu
dcterms:description: A dataset containing only long texts with a minimum length of 500 characters, primarily sourced from formal articles, blogs, self-media, and portals.
dcterms:title: Long Text Dataset
